hanzi-su-wiki:
式

Значения

Церемония, акт, торжество; форма, стиль; метод, система; формула

Мнемоника

  • Делать копья 弋 по определённому образцу, пользуясь для разметки рейсмусом 工.

  • Церемония бракосочетания.

heisig_keyword: style | формула, метод, стиль, церемония, ритуал
heisig_chinese_memo: Each Indian tribe works to craft their arrows in a certain style..
heisig_story: Take style in its sense of some fashion design or model. Then let the element arrow and craft stand for the well-known style of shirts known as "Arrow shirts" because of the little arrow sewn on each one.
Keyword_KANJIDIC: style, ceremony, rite, function, method, system, form, expression

koohiiStory2: The latest style is shirts crafted out of arrows.
jp_example_words:
株式(かぶしき): stock (company)
式場(しきじょう): ceremonial hall, place of ceremony (e.g. marriage)
方式(ほうしき): form, method, system
様式(ようしき): style, form, pattern
儀式(ぎしき): ceremony, rite, ritual, service
形式(けいしき): form, formality, format, mathematics expression
公式(こうしき): formula, formality, official
式(しき): equation, formula, ceremony
正式(せいしき): due form, official, formality
葬式(そうしき): funeral
方程式(ほうていしき): equation
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic:
To construct a whole ceremony, you can’t just make it up on the spot. That is not a ceremony. A ceremony has a past. A ceremony is done a certain way because that’s the way it’s always been done. In short, to build a ceremony, you have to create a ritual first. Then, the ritual can be constructed into a bigger, more lavish ceremony.
This kanji also means equation for some reason too. Just think of a ceremony that involves doing math and coming up with equations. How strange would that be? Pretend you're at this ceremony.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Ritual and Ceremony kind of mean the same things, sort of. Don't worry too much if you mix them up a little - both will help you to remember the other. There's a reason this kanji is made up of the ceremony radical already!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: So, you’re at a ritual. Think of the most ridiculous ceremony you can think of. Give it a shot – I’ll let you come up with the ridiculousness this time (it’s good practice). When you think of your mnemonic, make sure to imagine it with a Sheikh (an Arabic leader). Have the sheikh do something ridiculous to help you to think of this sheikh (しき) and then remember this on’yomi.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: It’s good to practice making your own mnemonics up every once in a while. It’ll help you to add on to the mnemonics already here and make better ones more personal to yourself!
Ru_Meaning: style, ceremony, rite, function, method, system, form, expression
Ru_Notes: Не путать: 武 (たけ、ブ оружие).

humanum_full_description_en:
From the " work ", " Yi " sound, original meaning as a criterion, and his testimonies. "Shuowen": "Faye. From work, sound." "Poetry·Daya·Xiawu": "To become a king's Fu, to go down to the earth." Mao Chuan: "Style, method."

" Style " can represent a role model or role model. "Shu‧The Life of the Weizi": "The world enjoys virtue, the style of all nations." Kong Chuan: "Yanweizi enjoys virtue for many generations, and is not an ancestor. Although it is the same as the prince, it is special for the world."

" Form " also means to imitate. "The Book of the Later Han Dynasty-Cui Qi Biography": "You must do what you want to say, and you should set the foundation, so that people will master the five emperors and form the three kings."

" Style " also means style and format. Song Hongmai's "Rongzhai Three Pens‧Edict Formats": "Forms of table-zoo, account book, Guan Qi, Fu Xie, etc., if there is a system model, they are all styles."

" Style " also refers to methods and forms, and more often refers to the methods or forms used to speak and do things. Tang Yuanzhen's "Talents, Knowledge and Maoming's Strategies for Physical Use": "The selection of the official's dismissal and judgment of the body and words. There are three styles for appointing people: one is the style of schooling...the third is the style of appointing a good person.

" Form " can also be used. "Shu‧Pangengxia": "The style is for the morality of the people, and the shoulders and one heart are forever." Kong Yingdashu: "Use this cloth to show the people."
humanum_short_description_en: From the " work ", " Yi " sound, original meaning as a criterion, and his testimonies.
humanum_full_description:
從「工」，「弋」聲，本義為准則、法度。《說文》：「法也。从工，聲。」《詩‧大雅‧下武》：「成王之孚，下土之式。」毛傳：「式，法也。」

　　「式」可表示楷模、榜樣。《書‧微子之命》：「世世享德，萬邦作式。」孔傳：「言微子累世享德，不忝厥祖，雖同公侯而特為萬國法式。」

　　「式」還表示效法。《後漢書‧崔駰傳》：「必欲行若言，當大定其本，使人主師五帝而式三王。」

　　「式」亦表示指樣式、格式。宋洪邁《容齋三筆‧敕令格式》：「表奏、帳籍、關牒、符檄之類，有體制模楷者，皆為式。」

　　「式」還指方式、形式，多指說話做事所采取的方法或形式。唐元稹〈才識兼茂明於體用策〉：「吏部罷書判身言之選，設三式以任人：一曰校能之式……三曰任賢之式。」

　　「式」還可表示用。《書‧盤庚下》：「式敷民德，永肩一心。」孔穎達疏：「用此布示於民。」
humanum_short_description: 從「工」，「弋」聲，本義為准則、法度。

從「 工 」，「 弋 」聲，本義為准則、法度。《說文》：「法也。从工，聲。」《詩‧大雅‧下武》：「成王之孚，下土之式。」毛傳：「式，法也。」 「 式 」可表示楷模、榜樣。《書‧微子之命》：「世世享德，萬邦作式。」孔傳：「言微子累世享德，不忝厥祖，雖同公侯而特為萬國法式。」 「 式 」還表示效法。《後漢書‧崔駰傳》：「必欲行若言，當大定其本，使人主師五帝而式三王。」 「 式 」亦表示指樣式、格式。宋洪邁《容齋三筆‧敕令格式》：「表奏、帳籍、關牒、符檄之類，有體制模楷者，皆為式。」 「 式 」還指方式、形式，多指說話做事所采取的方法或形式。唐元稹〈才識兼茂明於體用策〉：「吏部罷書判身言之選，設三式以任人：一曰校能之式……三曰任賢之式。」 「 式 」還可表示用。《書‧盤庚下》：「式敷民德，永肩一心。」孔穎達疏：「用此布示於民。」
From the " work", " Yi" sound, original meaning as a criterion, and his testimonies. "Shuowen": "Faye. From work, sound." "Poetry·Daya·Xiawu": "To become a king's Fu, to go down to the earth." Mao Chuan: "Style, method." " Style" can represent a role model or role model. "Shu‧The Life of the Weizi": "The world enjoys virtue, the style of all nations." Kong Chuan: "Yanweizi enjoys virtue for many generations, and is not an ancestor. Although it is the same as the prince, it is special for the world." " Form" also means to imitate. "The Book of the Later Han Dynasty-Cui Qi Biography": "You must do what you want to say, and you should set the foundation, so that people will master the five emperors and form the three kings." " Style" also means style and format. Song Hongmai's "Rongzhai Three Pens‧Edict Formats": "Forms of table-zoo, account book, Guan Qi, Fu Xie, etc., if there is a system model, they are all styles." " Style" also refers to methods and forms, and more often refers to the methods or forms used to speak and do things. Tang Yuanzhen's "Talents, Knowledge and Maoming's Strategies for Physical Use": "The selection of the official's dismissal and judgment of the body and words. There are three styles for appointing people: one is the style of schooling...the third is the style of appointing a good person. " Form" can also be used. "Shu‧Pangengxia": "The style is for the morality of the people, and the shoulders and one heart are forever." Kong Yingdashu: "Use this cloth to show the people."

式字的基本解释

式
shì
物体外形的样子：式样。样式。
特定的规格：格式。程式。
典礼，有特定内容的仪式：开幕式。阅兵式。
自然科学中表明某些关系或规律的一组符号：分子式。算式。公式。
一种语法范畴，表示说话者对所说事情的主观态度：叙述式。命令式。

：榜样，楷模；规格，样式；仪式，典礼。

formula
shì
The appearance of the object: style. style.
Specific specifications: format. Program.
Ceremony, a ceremony with a specific content: the opening ceremony. parade.
A set of symbols in natural sciences that indicate certain relationships or laws: molecular formulas. Math. formula.
A grammatical category that expresses the speaker's subjective attitude towards what is said: narrative. Imperative.

Name meaning
: Role model, model; specification, style; ceremony, ceremony.
shì
1) образец, стандарт, эталон, тип, форма; норма; фасон, покрой; трафарет; стиль (также родовая морфема)
格式 тип, образец
旧式 старый фасон; старомодный
四式体服 парадное платье западного (европейского) покроя
2) образец, пример для подражания, идеал
其清白为百僚式 своей безупречностью он был достойным примером подражания для всех сослуживцев
为天下式 служить образцом (быть идеалом) для Поднебесной
下土之式 образец для подвластных земель
3) твёрдое правило; регламент, постановление; закон
永式 закон на вечные времена
4) формула, условное обозначение
公式 формула
方程式 уравнение
代数式 алгебраическое выражение
分子式 молекулярная формула
5) грам. наклонение
命令式 повелительное наклонение
假定式 сослагательное наклонение
6) яп. этикет, ритуал, церемониал, торжество, обряд (также родовая морфема)
阅兵式 принимать парад
结婚式 обряд бракосочетания
开幕式 церемония открытия (напр. съезда)
毕业式 выпускной акт
-----
1) Ши (фамилия)
2) начальная частица предложения в раннем древнекитайском языке
а) пусть бы; эх, кабы...; хорошо бы (антоним 勿, 无)
兄及弟以! 式相好 (hǎo) 矣, 无相犹矣! Старшие братья и младшие! Пусть бы любили друг друга, не строя козней взаимных !
б) зачем?
式微, 式微, 胡不归? 微君之故, 胡为乎中露? Зачем, о, зачем мы ничтожны, бедны? И почему же домой мы не едем? Без Ваших, государь, дел, - зачем бы здесь мы мокли на росе?
4) следовать примеру; подавать пример
5) * вм. 轼 (передняя стенка-барьер колесницы; рит. поклон, совершаемый с колесницы с упором на переднюю стенку)
6) * рит. поклон (совершаемый перед воротами дома почитаемого лица)
7) вм. 栻 (бирки для гадания)
8) вм. 拭 (вытираться; обтирать, вытирать)
9) вм. 轼 (опираться в поклоне на переднюю стенку колесницы)
10) * вм. 以, 用 (употреблять, применять, пользоваться)

式

Значения

Церемония, акт, торжество; форма, стиль; метод, система; формула

Мнемоника

  • Делать копья 弋 по определённому образцу, пользуясь для разметки рейсмусом 工.

  • Церемония бракосочетания.
Radicals: 弋, 工  (ceremony, construction)
Meaning Mnemonic
To construct a whole ceremony, you can’t just make it up on the spot. That is not a ceremony. A ceremony has a past. A ceremony is done a certain way because that’s the way it’s always been done. In short, to build a ceremony, you have to create a ritual first. Then, the ritual can be constructed into a bigger, more lavish ceremony.
This kanji also means equation for some reason too. Just think of a ceremony that involves doing math and coming up with equations. How strange would that be? Pretend you're at this ceremony.
Ritual and Ceremony kind of mean the same things, sort of. Don't worry too much if you mix them up a little - both will help you to remember the other. There's a reason this kanji is made up of the ceremony radical already!
Reading Mnemonic
So, you’re at a ritual. Think of the most ridiculous ceremony you can think of. Give it a shot – I’ll let you come up with the ridiculousness this time (it’s good practice). When you think of your mnemonic, make sure to imagine it with a Sheikh (an Arabic leader). Have the sheikh do something ridiculous to help you to think of this sheikh (しき) and then remember this on’yomi.
It’s good to practice making your own mnemonics up every once in a while. It’ll help you to add on to the mnemonics already here and make better ones more personal to yourself!

工 (техника), 弋 (стрела с бечевой)
Не путать: 武 (たけ、ブ оружие).
